name: Minion Magnets V2
description:
This is a prototype I'm working on after my previous YouTube video!

The goal is to survive as long as you can

Drag body parts into the death pit to earn currency

Update V2

  • Added health generation upgrade
  • Added fire rate upgrade
  • Added controls UI
  • Added main menu
  • Added pause menu
  • Added bullet impacts
  • Added music
  • Added blood screen
  • Improved magnet power
  • Improved gun shot sound
  • Improved weapon model
  • Made gun automatic
  • You now die if you fall off the map
  • Highscore is recorded, saved, and displayed
  • Enemy's now hurt you as soon as they touch you

Controls

[WASD] Movement

[Left Click] Shoot

[Right Click] Magnetize

[TAB] Toggle laptop

[Q/E] Tab through laptop

[F] Purchase upgrade

[ESC] Pause

Performance may not be good as you play because there is no limit for the amount of Ai there can be. There may be many bugs so good luck!

If you've just so happened to stumble upon this game without watching the intended video check it out to see why & how it was made!
